Let’s spar once we’ve restored our Vigor.
The opponent is considering how to deal with you...thinking of the relations between you two and their attitude toward you...weighing the risks...
Forbidden area! No entry for strangers!
What are you looking at? Get out!
You wanna join our sect? Impossible!
Meet the entry requirements and you can become one of us!
I’ve reported to the sect leader. The honorable one,you’ll receive the leader’s letter soon.
Hum? Get up!
Who’s hiding there? Come out!

Nice gear!
This Skill is perfect for me!
Warrior,thank you for saving me!
Horses like eating grass. Monkeys like eating pinecones or plums. Martens and snakes like eating meat and eggs. Eagles like eating meat.
Soon there will be a Kungfu Contest in areas with such a campaign. I can't wait any longer. Is there anything that a martial arts champion can't do? Hahahaha!
There’s a Bulletin Board at the Mountain Gate of every sect. You can take a look,see if you meet their Entry Requirements. But I’m not sure whether you’re worthy or not.
You can use your Chi to heal minor injury. If the injury is too severe,you can go to clinic for healing. But Clinics often charge a high fee. ..
Trade,complete commissions,or work at all kinds of stores. But doing illegal business always earns more. Ahaha,just like taking supplements will make you stronger!
Hehe,no one is invincible in this world. You can improve your power by collecting more skills,Inner Kungfu,Abilities,and Gears. But remember,only the fitting combination means the true power.
I heard that you can acquire advanced Qinggong at the Eagle Hunt Platform and Mirror Lake Stonewoods.
Give everything you owe me now!
You’re not too stupid,huh? Now get out! Don’t mess with me! !
That was your lesson today!
Sorry,I didn’t mean to do this! Let’s forget this,shall we?
I'm tired today. Come and see me tomorrow.
I'm tired today. I need to digest what we just covered. Let's continue tomorrow.
(...Hold still...Just bear with it for a little longer, we're almost there! ! ! )
Not bad,I bet you can unify the martial arts world.
Haha,I just invented it. Didn’t expect there would be a side effect. I’ll find you when I fix this.
Humph! Don’t say I didn’t warn you!
Good day,sir! May you live a long and healthy life!
I’m too kind to see children poorer than me...
You made me cry! Time to say goodbye!
Thanks Bodhisattva!!
The cold wind is howling. The white snow is falling...
How did I meet a blind person...
Two healthy legs are way more important! Does my wisdom dwarf yours? Ahahaha!
Even the most powerful one can be hurt by gossips and backstabbing,right? ?
A man of morality values righteousness,while the despicable eye silver and gold. The people who are merely profit-driven will eventually turn against you.
We’re two of the same kind! !
This is what we call love,ahaha!
I made 38 couples get married! I did a quite good job,didn’t I?
Thank you for saving me! Here is a pill handed down from our ancestors. Please take it,warrior.
My leg is broken! Give me 1000 coins! Or I’ll find the seniors and accuse you of bullying me! !!
Ah,the business isn’t going well these days...
You’re seriously ill. I suggest you go to the Clinic at [Flora Valley] later on. Here is a [Marrow Refining Pill]. It can help you heal some of the ailments!
Oh,I thought you’re a freshman.
Haha,you’re not stupid,huh? Bye.
I must teach you a lesson! !
Good! From this day on,we resolve to band together to face whatever lies ahead!
Humph! Don’t say I didn’t warn you!
Nice!
Humph!
Put this on. You need to keep warm. You can’t catch a cold in this state.
You ask for this. Goodbye and never see you again.
Build the residence to shelter yourself from the cold and restore Vigor in it!
Having a hot spring bath,taking a sip of tea at the teahouse,or listening to melodies at the Music House will cheer you up!
Really? Many thanks! Ahaha,I promise I’ll share it with you when I master it. !!
It’s said the skill in this manual is the most powerful one in this world. Don’t you want to have a look at it? !
That stone lies on the Dragonhead in Longting. Find a way to get there on your own!
Believe it or not,it’s up to you!
Here,here,let me mark a location for you. Go look over there.

Bye!

The sole key to mastery lies in diligence. Practice hard, and you'll rise to greatness.

By heaven and earth, I love only you!
I need nothing else but you. Let us grow old together, till death do us part.
My love runs deep as the sea. I entrust myself to you, till our hairs turn grey.
May the heaven and earth bear witness, I love you through life and death.
From this day forward, I pledge to stay by your side till the end of our lives.

Ah,that’s a good wine! !!
Nothing lifts the spirits like a good ol' drink!
Life is short, let's make merry! Raise a glass, say bye to your worries!
Life is harsh. Only this flask offers some solace.
Life is fleeting, have fun when you can! Here's to my health!
Life is fleeting, time to have fun!
Life doesn't always go as planned. Better find joy when you can than dwell on woes!
Life is but a dream, toil and labor won't endure. Seize the moment, with a glass of wine. Release the burdens of earthly confine.
Life is a dream, joy makes it sweet. A glass of fine wine, makes the moment shine.
Life and death are predestined, so are riches and fame. Embrace the joy of the moment, lest youth goes to waste.
Alas, the many autumns that have gone by. How the world ages!
What peace and happiness. What more can the seasons bring?
Flowers come and go, the moon waxes and wanes. This life won't repeat, so let's drink to the heart's content.
The river flows, carrying memories of heroes. Life is a leaf adrift, caught in the draught of death. Here's to health, to joy in the moment.

Oh, it's that detestable face again!
You nuisance! Just looking at you makes me puke!
You're disgusting!
Don't make a scene! Hand over your belongings, and your life shall be spared! !

You dare provoke me, thug! You don't know what you're up against!

You dare provoke me? You're too full of yourself!
You dare provoke me, loser? You must have a death wish!
